thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: China Retaliates Against Trump Tariffs With Duties on American Meat and Fruit

author: Charles Hutzler
title: China Retaliates Against Trump Tariffs With Duties on American Meat and Fruit

organizations.name: china retaliates against trump tariffs with duties on american meat

text:
BEIJING—China imposed tariffs on a range of U.S. goods, following through on a promise to retaliate against the Trump administration’s penalties on imports of Chinese steel and aluminum.
The Chinese Finance Ministry said in a statement dated Sunday that the previously announced tariffs on the imports of American goods would take effect Monday.

Penalties... RELATED VIDEO Will Trump's Import Tariffs Cause Trade Wars? President Trump signed an executive order on Tuesday that imposed tariffs on washing machines and solar panels. WSJ's Gerald F. Seib examined whether these moves could ignite a trade war with South Korea and China. Photo: AP (Originally Published January 24, 2018) To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
